maqras.text: 43|57|maliaui adeul yesuleul yeleul deulmyeon geudaeui baegseong-eun geuleul jolongha myeo solan-eul piugo
43|58|uliui sindeul-i hullyunghanyo a nimyeon geuga hullyunghanyo lago geudeul-eun malhaessdeola ileohdeus geudeul-eun geudaeegenonjaenghalyeo hayeoss-euni nonjaeng-eul ilsamneunmulideul-ila
43|59|geuneun han jong-e bulgwahanila hananim-eun geuege eunhyeleul bepul-eo i seula-el jason-eul wihan gyohun-i doege hayeossnola
43|60|hananim-i wonhasyeossdamyeon geubun-euncheonsadeullo hayeogeum daejiwiui gyeseungjaga doel su issge hayeoss-eulila
43|61|sillo yesuui jaelim-eun simpan-i dagaom-eul yesihaneun geos-ila illeo galodoe geu sigag-e daehayeo uisimchi malgo naleul ttaleula igeos-i olh-eun gil-ila
43|62|geuligo satan-i neohuileul yuhog haji moshadolog hala sillo geuneun neohuiui bunmyeonghan jeog-ila

43|63|yesuga bunmyeonghan yejeung-gwa deobul-eo geudeul-ege ileuleo malhagil naega jihyeleul gajigo neohuiege wassnani neohuiga nonjaenghaneun geos-eul balghyeo jugess nola geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago naege sunjonghala
43|64|hananim-eun naui junim-iyo tto han neohuiui junim-ila geuleomeulo geu bunman-eul gyeongbaehala igeos-i baleun gil inila
43|65|geuleona geudeul jung-ui mulideul-eun uigyeon-eul dalli haess-euni geudeul joeindeul egeneun gotongseuleoun nal beol-i iss-eu lila
43|66|geudeul-eun alji moshaneun sungan-e dagchyeool geu siganman-eul gidaligo iss dan mal-inyo
43|67|geunal-ui chingudeul-eun seologa seo lo-ege jeog-i doelila geuleona uilo un jadeulman-eun je-oela
43|68|naui jongdeul-iyeo geunal-ui neohui egeneun dulyeoumdo seulpeumdo eobsnola
43|69|ideul-eun hananim-ui malsseum-eul mid eo iseullam-e gwiuihan jadeul-ini
43|70|neohuiwa geuligo anaega hamkke cheongug-eulo deul-eogala neohuiga gippeohalila

43|71|hwang-geum-ui jeobsideulgwa keobdeul-i geu deul juwileul maemdolmyeo geu an-eneun geudeul-ui yeonghon-i wonhaneun modeun geosgwa geudeul-ui nundeul-eul gappeohage hal modeun geosdeul-i issnani neohuineun geu an-eseo yeongsaenghal geos-ila
43|72|geugeos-eun neohuiga haenghan daega-e ttala mullyeo bad-eun cheongug-eulo
43|73|neohuineun geu an-eseo pungseonghan gwail-eul masbomyeo geugeos-e manjoghalila
43|74|geuleona joeindeul-egeneun jiog-uibeol-i iss-eul geos-imyeo geudeul-eun geugos-e seo yeongjuhage doenola
43|75|geudeul-eul wihae geu beol-i gabyeowojil su eobs-euni geudeul-eun geu an-eseo jeolmanghadoda
43|76|igeos-eun hananim-i geudeul-eul bu danghage han geos-i anila seuseuloleul yogdoege han geos-eun geudeul jasindeul-ieoss nola
43|77|ittae geudeul-eun cheonsayeo junim-eulo hayeogeum beol-eul geodueo judolog hayeo jusoseo lago hosohani geuleol su eobsnola neohuineun geugos-eseo salge doelila daedabhasideola
43|78|hananimkkeseo neohuiege jinlileuljueossgeonman neohui daedasuneun geu jinli leul jeung-ohamyeo
43|79|geudeul seuseulo eummoleul kkumyeoss-eu na hananim-eun seunglike hayeossnola
43|80|hananimkkeseo geudeul-i sumgineun geosgwa geudeul-i jugobadneun bimil-ui dae hwaleul deudji mosham-ila saenglahaneunyo anila ttohan cheonsadeul-i gilogha nila
43|81|illeogalodoe jabiloun hananimkkeseo adeul-eul gajyeossdamyeon naege jeil meonjeo gyeongbaehaneun jaga doelila
43|82|cheonjiui junimmisimyeo gwonja-e oleusil junimkke myeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo sillo geubun-eun bulsinjadeul-i myosahan bun-i anisila
43|83|geuleomeulo geojisgwa yogdoeneun mal e tamnighan geudeul-eul geudaelo dula geudeul-i yagsogbadneun geunal-eul maj-ihalila
43|84|geubun-eun haneul-edo gyesimyeo dae jiwiedo gyesineun hananim-eulo jihyewa asim-eulo chungmanhasin bun-isila
43|85|haneulgwa daejiwa geu saie issneun modeun wang-gug-i geubun-ui geos-eulo geubunkke chugbog-i iss-eusoseo geubunman-i simpan-ui nal-eul algo gyesini neohuineun geubunkkelo dol-a ganola
43|86|hananim anin daleun geos-eul sungbaehan jadeul-egeneun jungjaehal neunglyeog-i eobs eudoe jinlileul jeung-eonhan janeun ye-oelo geudeul-eun geuleul algo issnola
43|87|geudeul-eul changjohan bun-i nugu-i nyo mudneundamyeon hananim-ilago geudeul-eunmalhanila geuleomyeonseodo geudeul-eun jinlilobuteo oemyeonhalyeo haneunyo
43|88|juyeo sillo geudeul-eun midji anhneunbaegseongdeul-ibnida lago malhaneun yeeonjaui oechim-i deullyeossnola
43|89|geudaeyeo geudeullobuteo meolli ha la geuligo annyeonghi iss-eula malhala geudeul-eun god alge doelila
44|1|ha mim
44|2|sasil-eul balghyeojuneun i seongseoemaengsehamyeo
44|3|hananim-eun geugeos-eul chugbogbad-eun bam-e gyesihaessnani geugeos-eulo gyeong-goha goja ham-ila
44|4|geunal bam modeun jiheloun ildeul i myeongbaeghayeojini
44|5|hananim-ui myeonglyeong-ila sillo geubunkkeseo seonjijadeul-eul bonaessnola
44|6|geugeos-eun junim-eulobuteoui jabi la sillo hananim-eun deul-eusigo asi neun bun-isila
44|7|neohuiga hwagsilhan mid-eum-eul gajil ttae geubun-eun haneulgwa daeji geuligo geusaie issneun manmul-ui junim-isila
44|8|geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo saeng myeong-eul jusigo saengmyeong-eul as-a gasineun bundo geubun-eulo neohuiui junim-iyo ttohan neohui josang-ui junim-isila
44|9|geuleona geudeul-eun uisimhamyeo jolong hani
44|10|haneul-i jit-eun yeongilo gadeug chaneun geunal-eul geudaeneun jikyeobolila
44|11|yeongiga salamdeul-eul deop-eo gali uni gotongseuleoun beol-ila
44|12|bulsinjadeul-eun juyeo jeohuiege i beol-eul geodueo jusoseo jeohuiga mid gessnaida
44|13|geu gyohun-i geudeul-ege yuyongha gessneunyo jinlileul balghyeojuneun seonjijaga geudeul-ege imi imhasyeossdoda
44|14|geuleona geudeul-eun geulobuteo deung eul dollimyeo geuga michinjala malhadeo la
44|15|hananimkkeseo jamsi eungbeol-eul geo dueo jumyeon neohuineun dasi saagham-eu lo dol-agal geos-ila
44|16|gajang gyeoglyeolhan eungbeol-i iss-eul geunal hananim-eun gotongseuleoon beol-eul ga halila
